testcase.name: Verify whether User is able to access - VMS Application MSP User
Adjust Dashboard MSP User
testcase.system-out: Given In Dashboard, click the Setting Icon in the top right hand corner.....passed Then User can Add New Widget, Save dashboard configuration, empty dashboard and close editing.passed

testcase.name: View and Adjust User Settings MSP User
testcase.system-out: Given In Dashboard, click user icon picture in bottom left corner; a flyout window will open and click on ""Account Settings"".passed When User can change specific items on user, including user photo...........passed Then If changes made, click ""Save""".......................................passed

testcase.name: Add Job in system MSP User
testcase.system-out: Given Click the second icon on the left navigation panel....................passed Then A flyout window will appear. Click on ""Create Job""...................passed Then On the job template field, enter the job title or look for the desired job title under "Recent Job Templates" or "Popular Job Templates".passed Then Select the job manager - work location will be auto populated; continue to select program industry.passed Then Click on "Continue" button"............................................passed

testcase.name: Add Job in system MSP User 2
testcase.system-out: Given In second page of Add Job, selected the estimated started and end dates of the Job,number of positions, expense allowed, Currency, Unit of Measure, Min and Max Bill Rate, and Over time exempt.passed Then Post entry, scroll down to end of page to view the budget..............passed Then Click "view detailed estimate" to view the components that add up to create the budget; change details as needed.passed Then Click "Continue".......................................................passed

testcase.name: Add Job in system MSP User 3
testcase.system-out: Given The foundational data will be defaulted based on the selection made . Click each field to make changes if necessary.passed Then Click "Submit" to create the job.......................................passed

testcase.name: View Job Workflow on Job Requisition MSP User
testcase.system-out: Given Once submitted, the user will be shown the details of the job created.passed Then Click on the approvals tab on the job detatils page to view the approval workflow.passed Then You should see the first level of approval as the Hiring Manager and the second level of approval as HM+1".passed

testcase.name: Approve Step 1 of Job Requisition Client User/HM
testcase.system-out: Given Login as Hiring manager using the credentials for the Hiring Manager..passed Then From the dashboard under pending actions widget, click on jobs pending approval.passed Then Select the job created and either click on the approval tab or on the Pending approval button on the top right corner of the screen..passed Then Click on approve.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Approve Step 2 of Job Requisition Client User/HM
testcase.system-out: Given Login as Hiring manager+1 using the credentials for the Hiring Manager+1.passed Then From the dashboard under pending actions widget, click on jobs pending approval.passed Then Select the job created and either click on the approval tab or on the Pending approval button on the top right corner of the screen..passed Then Click on approve.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Release Job to supplier/s MSP User
testcase.system-out: Given Log back in as the MSP User, click on the briefcase icon on the left navigation panel and from the flyout window select View All jobs.passed Then Click on the Job title of the Job you're working on....................passed Then Job Details should open and you will find an actions button on the top right corner of the screen;.passed Then select Distribute......................................................passed Then This will bring the user to the distribute tab and the user can type to search the vendors.passed Then Once added, Click on Enbale Submission Limit toggle to set it ON or OFF.passed Then Click on Distribute....................................................passed

testcase.name: Create and Submit Candidate as Vendor
